name: Anime Was a Mistake
description:
You are a young anime nerd preparing for a date. This would be one of the greatest nights of your life… if only you hadn’t forgotten to clean up. Your date is already on the way, so get rid of your embarrassing anime paraphernalia before she gets here!

(This was our first ludum dare!)

Controls

Arrow keys- move

Shift - sprint

Spacebar - interact

edit: updated to include a WebGL build! Now you can play in your browser!! :)
